amendment.description: An amendment numbered 50 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to prohibit funding for the American Climate Corps.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A034) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 207 - 204 (Roll no. 550).

action.text: Pursuant to clause 6(h) of rule XVIII, the votes of the Delegates and Resident Commissioners were decisive on the previous vote and a separate vote in the House was required.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 209 (Roll no. 549).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 209 (Roll no. 549).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A034) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 207 - 204 (Roll no. 550).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
